claw.tatsu.primitive

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.primitive.Module

  • public final class Module
extends java.lang.Object
    Primitive transformation and test and utility for XcodeML/F and CLAW enhanced module files. This includes: - Locate module file and load it into FortranModule object. - Locate CLAW enhanced module file and load it into FortranModule object. - Format specific suffix for module writing and search. - Update signature of a function type in a module file.
    Author:
    clementval

      • find

        public static FortranModule find(java.lang.String moduleName)
        Find module by name.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Name of the module.
        Returns:
        A FortranModule object representing the module if found. Null otherwise.

        public static FortranModule findClaw(java.lang.String moduleName)
        Locate a module file generated by CLAW translator.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Name of the module.
        Returns:
        A FortranModule object representing the module if found. Null otherwise.

      • getSuffix

        public static java.lang.String getSuffix()
        Get a formatted suffix for the CLAW module file including the directive and target of the current transformation. .[directive].[target].claw
        Returns:
        A formatted string for the CLAW module file name.

      • updateSignature

        public static void updateSignature(java.lang.String moduleName,
                                   XcodeProgram xcodeml,
                                   FfunctionDefinition fctDef,
                                   FfunctionType fctType,
                                   ModuleCache moduleCache,
                                   boolean importFctType)
                            throws IllegalTransformationException
        Update the function signature in the module file to reflects local changes.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Module name to update.
        xcodeml - Current XcodeML file unit.
        fctDef - Function definition that has been changed.
        fctType - Function type that has been changed.
        moduleCache - Current module cache.
        importFctType - If true, import the functionType.
        Throws:
        IllegalTransformationException - If the module file or the function cannot be located
